EmailTemplate.name: RE: Things to Know about MBO Partners (1347550341.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Things to Know about MBO Partners (1347550341.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Anne, You can absolutely put this against your taxable income in the MBO program. Here are the steps: 1. Log in to the MBO account click on "personal info" and then click on "home office certification." Once on that page, check the box that states "I want to declare a home office" and hit save. (This will allow us to deduct the mileage.) 2. Once you have certified that you have a home office you may go in and enter the expenses by following these instructions. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_Time_and_Expense_Entry_Instructions.pdf> Details on our Dental insurance coverage can be found here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits-dental-plan-2012> If you would like to walk through this together on the phone I am more than happy to do that as well. Thanks Anne,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message----- From: Anne Lancaster Bell [mailto:annelancaster@juno.com] Sent: Thursday, September 13, 2012 9:36 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Things to Know about MBO Partners Sarah,I am concerned about the tolls to Ashburn, which amount to $4.40 per day, plus the 46 miles round-trip to the office at Intelligent Design. I would like to be able to deduct them at the rate I use for government local travel at .$.51 per mile. Is that possible. I have used a whole tank of gas going back and forth with no other destinations in between. Other than that I have just mild interest in the dental insurance. Our health insurance is already taken care of. If you could help me with the travel expenses that would help a lot.Best, Anne ____________________________________________________________Woman is 53 But Looks 25Mom reveals 1 simple wrinkle trick that has angered doctors...http://thirdpartyoffers.juno.com/TGL3141/5051e17734a2b61777777st02duc <http://thirdpartyoffers.juno.com/TGL3141/5051e17734a2b61777777st02duc>
